title: Buildcache fails relocating gaudi
body:
Running `spack buildcache install gaudi`, `patchelf` fails when trying to relocate one of the files: 

### Expected Result

`gaudi` package installed and relocated in my prefix path

### Actual Result

`patchelf` command reports a `strange: no string table` error message:

```
==> Installing buildcache for spec gaudi@v28r1%gcc@6.2.0 build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=linux-scientificcernslc6-x86_64 
==> Relocating package from
  /my/local/buildnode/spack/opt/spack to /different/node/x86_64-slc6-gcc62-opt.
strange: no string table
==> Error: Command exited with status 1:
'/different/node/opt/patchelf-0.9-zjxrrn5fdligyg263rba6uzcqrr3uyzj/bin/patchelf' '--print-rpath' '/different/node/test/x86_64-slc6-gcc62-opt/linux-scientificcernslc6-x86_64/gcc-6.2.0/gaudi-v28r1-v32rnk3hdvnjr3nyo4qt7emecdpbxbe6/lib/libPartPropSvc.so.dbg'
```

Same process works for other packages, I see this problem only with `gaudi` which spack recipe is in [hep-spack repo](https://github.com/HEP-SF/hep-spack/blob/master/packages/gaudi/package.py)

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install gaudi %gcc@6.2.0 # in my case i'm building against external packages
$ spack buildcache create -d ./tarballs gaudi

# Send ./tarballs to a different node
# In that node
$ spack buildcache install $package
```
### Information on your system

 1. Platform: slc6 with gcc62
 2. Building against a bunch of packages remotely installed in a cvmfs server 


@gartung  Have you faced this problem by any chance?
